https://tmrev.io/movie/623259-Body & Bones 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qkfLCa0WIKX6kddMt498Ev4Pa93.jpg Diminished by grief, 18-year-old Tess (Kelly Van Der Burg) is moving through her life like a ghost. The one thing that comforts her is listening to the music of Danny Sharpe (Joel Thomas Hynes), a local legend who left home almost 20 years ago. Tess is stunned when she wakes up one day to find him in her kitchen, igniting a spark of life in her that grows out of control. Body & Bones
